010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012public class MeanThresholder extends GlobalThresholder {
013        
014        public MeanThresholder() {
015                super();
016        }
017
018        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
019                // calculate mean of entire image:
020                int K = h.length;
021                int cnt = 0;
022                long sum = 0;
023                for (int i=0; i<K; i++) {
024                        cnt += h[i];
025                        sum += i * h[i];
026                }
027                
028                int mean = (int) Math.rint((double)sum / cnt);
029
030                // count resulting background pixels:
031                int n0 = 0;
032                for (int i = 0; i <= mean; i++) {
033                        n0 += h[i];
034                }
035                
036                // determine if background or foreground is empty:
037                int q = (n0 < cnt) ? mean : -1; 
038                return q;
039        }
040}
